ctlive_afktimer.config.title: CT-Live AFK Timer Settings
ctlive_afktimer.config.group.description: Basic settings for the AFK Timer
ctlive_afktimer.config.afkTimeout.toolti: Time in minutes before you are marked as AFK
ctlive_afktimer.config.useEnglishAFKMess: Choose the language of AFK messages to other players. This setting takes effect immediately.
